name: ORIGINAL_ENROLL_VALS
description: This table stores the per member original value Tapestry Staging Companion (NSC) records.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORIG_VALS_MEM_ID
columns.description: This item stores the member that the original values NSC is associated with.

columns.name: ORIG_VALS_NSC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the original values staging companion for a member. It represents the values as received and loaded from the enrollment source.
